transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello yes sir. Ji madam.
Customer: Sir good morning main Tanu baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Kaunsi company se baat karna chahe rahe aap?
Customer: Yespal ji store se madam.
Executive: Achcha ji ji sir bataiye sir aapne call kara tha.
Customer: Sir asal mein woh Trust wala abhi live nahi hua madam.
Executive: Sir us pe kaam chal raha hai aap us pe kaam chal raha hai sir us pe kuch woh hamari side se payment toh aapne kar diya but hamari side se kuch receipt ki problem aa rahi hai jo us pe mail bhi hum mail set bhi chal raha hai. Toh isiliye thoda sa time lag raha hai varna yeh ho gaya hota ab tak. Unko kuch payment payment ka jo tag tag hota hai na sir woh nahi mil raha hai. Toh usme kuch problem aa rahi hai isliye aisa ho raha hai. And sir aap sir dekhiye jitna jaldi ho sakega hum karwa denge. Aaj bhi ho sakta hai sir kal bhi ho sakta hai ek do din lagega. Kyunki thoda kaam chal raha hai. Ji ji. Sir thoda time toh lagta hai na isko certificate banwana aur phir uske baad OVP hoti hai order verification process. Kya woh sir ji Rajeev ji ke paas phone kiya tha unhone phone nahi uthaya na aapne uthaya. Kisne Vivek sir ne. Haan Vivek sir. Achcha sir woh toh chutti pe hai unke ghar pe shadi hai toh woh chutti par hai. Achcha achcha. Ji isliye woh call receive nahi kar rahe honge isliye unka jo office wala phone hoga woh unhone sath band karke rakh diya hoga. Aapke paas bhi kiya tha shanivar ko. Sir Saturday Sunday off hota hai hamara aur main bhi sir office wala phone use nahi karti isliye call WhatsApp pe agar message aaya hota toh main check kar liya hota but call pe isliye main receive nahi kara. Koi baat nahi sir yeh aapne call kari thi sir toh woh humne receive nahi kari thi toh ek ticket open ho gaya toh uska ek feedback jata hai matlab ki dobara humne call kara ya nahi kara. Toh sir call toh baat toh ho hi gayi hai aur sir jitna jaldi ho sakega aap chinta mat kariye bilkul jitni jaldi ho sakega main karwa dungi. Aaj kal mein ho hi jayega yeh. Proper mail kar hi rahe hai sir hum yahan se. Theek hai sir? Ji. Madam aap kaunsa area tha kaunsi state se ho madam aap? UP se sir. Ji kyun sir kya hua? Nahi main puch raha tha pichli baar accountant tha woh Bihar se. Kuch bhi baat. Achcha achcha. Achcha Dinesh Kushwaha haan haan. Haan wahi. Hamare Saini ho gaye. Hum Saini laga diya Rajasthan mein woh hai Dinesh Kushwaha laga diya. Achcha achcha. Nahi sir mera toh state UP hai. Madam phir aaj woh catalog live woh change kar diya madam woh. Sir wohi thoda receipt ki problem aa rahi thi matlab payment toh aapke side se hui thi but hamare side se woh reflect nahi kar rahi show nahi kar rahi. Nahi nahi woh catalog catalog ki bola tha na maine woh. Haan. Product catalog. Sir catalog mein sir kya kya baat hui thi apni ek baar main dekh leti hu. Woh maine bola tha jaise jaliya koi 400 square feet hai. Toh uski jaliyon ki ek ek jali ka alag se catalog bana ke bhai yeh 2 by 4 ka piece hai teen ka piece hai. Achcha achcha uske liye sir maine bola tha na toh 5-10 minute agar video meet aap nikal lete time. Toh aap free hai madam aap? Aap free hai abhi main link share kar du aapko. Abhi main laptop kholta hu madam main. Achcha kitne time mein 11:30 baje ki video meet rakh du sir? Haan 11:30 baje. Ya phir abhi? Abhi main kholta hu toh 5 minute mein. Achcha theek hai toh main main 11:30 ka hi rakhti hu and sir abhi jaise aapke paas call aayi thi toh waise sir ko chutti pe hai lekin incoming aayi thi aur receive nahi hui thi toh hamari side se ek concern open ho jata hai. Woh isliye ki call back gayi ya nahi gayi. Toh sir call back toh maine kar hi liya aapko toh yeh jo concern hai isko main close kar du aapke paas ek mail jayegi. Ji ji. Toh us mail mein aap yes kar dijiyega ki haan aapke baat hui hai hamari side se call gayi hai. Theek hai? Toh uska feedback hota hai ki aapke paas dobara call gayi ya nahi gayi hai. Sir toh madam main kar dunga feedback. Theek hai sir and sir main link share kar du WhatsApp aapka number kaunsa hai yeh primary wala hi hai? Haan yahi hai. 648 wala. Theek hai. 642 hai na sir? Haan haan 642. Achcha theek hai maine aapko message kar diya hai. Main abhi laptop kholta hu. Ji ji sir aap laptop open kar lijiye. Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- TrustSeal not live yet.

- Receipt issue from IndiaMART side.

- Customer called Vivek sir, but no response.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the receipt issue.

- Agreed to schedule a video meet at 11:30 AM.

- Executive will close the concern ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to confirm the mail feedback.

- Executive to share the video meet link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, catalog, receipt, video meet, callback
